projetGrand.description: A CLI Twitter client. I needed a light client and none of the existing solutions were appealing enough to me, so I decided to create my own.

A Chrome extension made to learn how to create them. Before, snwflk was just a collection CSS stylesheets to refresh the interface of Tweetdeck. The extension allows a seamsless updates of the stylesheets, plus tthe possibility to adjust options without having to read the code.

projetPetit.description: A school group project made in a month with my friend Shadorc that's basically Portal in 2D written in Python. Since we couldn't use existing libraries, we had to come up with our own solutions and it was a pretty great challenge.
Pretty self-explanatory, isn't it? Moral is, don't make stupid bets. But still, it was a fun way to toy with C#.
